subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In their first at-bats in the Yankees’ victory, Kevin Youkilis and Mark Teixeira each saw seven pitches from the ace Jon Lester, a patience that would set the tone for the rest of the evening.
snippet: In their first at-bats in the Yankees’ victory, Kevin Youkilis and Mark Teixeira each saw seven pitches from the ace Jon Lester, a patience that would set the tone for the rest of the evening.
